text: Liked the song, and the game is alright, but anybody who heralds the game as a "masterpiece" severely needs to rethink themselves. It brings nothing to the table. Reversimg time? The concept is stale. YOU REALLY WERE THE BAD GUY ALL ALONG? Yawn. To be honest, i think braid is a glorified, over-funded flash game.

text: My favorite theme from this great unique game. I think I actually had to use a walkthrough once or twice to solve a puzzle because I just couldn't do it. The presentation is really nice though and the music fit very well. This particular theme was composed by Jami Sieber, she's a very kind person from the little email exchange I've had with her.
